info_message.plan_feature_no_access: Your current plan does not allow you to access this feature.

error_message.empty_fields: You must fill all the fields!

user_activation.subject: Welcome {{NAME}}! - Activation email
user_activation.body:
Hey there {{NAME}},

We are glad you joined us!

One more step and you are ready,

you just need to click the following link in order to join {{WEBSITE_TITLE}}

Activate your account

Greetings from {{WEBSITE_TITLE}}!

user_pending_email.subject: Confirm your email address change - {{WEBSITE_TITLE}}
user_pending_email.body:
Hey there {{NAME}},

You have requested to change your email address from {{CURRENT_EMAIL}} to {{NEW_EMAIL}}.

Please click on the link below to confirm your new email address.

Confirm email address change

Greetings from {{WEBSITE_TITLE}}!

user_lost_password.subject: Reset your password - {{WEBSITE_TITLE}}
user_lost_password.body:
Hey {{NAME}},

This is your reset password link: Reset Password

If you did not request this, you can ignore it!

Greetings from {{WEBSITE_TITLE}}!

user_payment.subject: Payment received - {{WEBSITE_TITLE}}
user_payment.body:
Hey there,

This is a confirmation that your payment has been received by us.

Your account plan is now paid until {{PLAN_EXPIRATION_DATE}}!

You can also check all the payments you made, change your plan or cancel it.

Greetings from {{WEBSITE_TITLE}}!

admin_new_user_notification.subject: New User Registered!
admin_new_user_notification.body:
Hey!

A new user just registered to the website!

Welcome %s with the %s email to your website!

admin_new_payment_notification.subject: New Payment via %s of %s %s!
admin_new_payment_notification.body:
Hey!

A user just paid %s %s to the website!

Here's to more earnings!

password.title: Password protected store
password.subheader: You must input the correct password to see the content of the store. Your password will be remembered for 30 days.

pages.title: Pages
pages.subheader: Here you can find useful page resources depending on your needs.

plan.title: Plan
plan.subheader_new: Select the most convenient plan for you.
plan.subheader_renew: Select one plan to renew or change your subscription.
plan.subheader_upgrade: Select one package to upgrade your subscription.

one.subheader: Our support team will help you with any questions you may have regarding our product.

two.subheader: We appreciate you and your privacy. This is why you control all the data that you bring with an account on our website.

three.subheader: We focus on delivering the best experience to you, as we fully understand how valuable time is.

faq.subheader: Here are the top most asked questions and their straight forward answers.

one.header: What forms of payment do you accept?
one.text: We accept payments via credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, Maestro, American Express) and PayPal as well.

two.text: Yes, you definitely can cancel your subscription and, you will still have access to all the features that you already paid for until the end of paid date range.

three.text: Yes, an invoice will be automatically generated for you after any payments from your account.

four.text: We do offer refunds in case something goes wrong or you change your mind, simply contact us if needed.

pay.title: Pay
pay.accept: By continuing with your order you confirm that you read, understand & agree to the %s and %s of the site.

free.free_already: Your already have the free plan activated!

store.title: %s store

input.domain_id_help: Select the domain that you'd like to use to create your store with.
input.is_main_store: Exclusive store for this custom domain
input.is_main_store_help: Make this store to be accessible via the index of this custom domain. Other stores won't be able to be associated with this domain after.
input.url_help: The main URL that your store is going to be able accessed from.
input.name: Name
input.title: Title
input.title_help: Short & descriptive title of your store.
input.logo_help: Your store's logo, recommended 1:1 ration for the logo (jpg, jpeg, png, gif or svg).
input.favicon_help: Your store's favicon, recommended 1:1 ration for the favicon (jpg, jpeg, png, gif or ico).
input.image_help: Your store's cover image (jpg, jpeg, png, gif or svg).
input.custom_css_help: Custom CSS to overwrite the already existing store style.
input.custom_js_help: You could add your own tracking javascript code to the store, for example.
input.email_reports_is_enabled_help: Get casual analytics email reports of your store.
input.email_orders_is_enabled_help: Get email notifications when a new order arrives.
input.ordering_on_premise_is_enabled_help: Your store guests will be able to order via the menu for on premise orders.
input.ordering_takeaway_is_enabled_help: Your store guests will be able to order via the menu for takeaway orders.
input.ordering_delivery_is_enabled_help: Your store guests will be able to order via the menu for delivered orders.
input.ordering_delivery_free_minimum_value: Delivery is free if the order value is above
input.paypal_instructions_1: Go to PayPal Developer Console and Login to your account after clicking the Log into Dashboard button.
input.paypal_instructions_2: Go to REST API apps section and click the Create App button.
input.paypal_instructions_3: Add your own details for the new app and create it.
input.paypal_instructions_4: Switch to Live by clicking the button near your new App's Name.
input.paypal_instructions_5: Copy the Client ID and Secret and paste them here accordingly.
input.stripe_instructions_1: Go to Stripe Dashboard and Login to your account..
input.stripe_instructions_3: Make sure your API keys are set to Live Mode so that you can accept real payments.
input.stripe_instructions_4: Copy the Publishable key and Secret key and paste them here accordingly.
input.stripe_instructions_5: From the sidebar, under Developers click on Webhooks link.
input.stripe_instructions_6: Click on the Add endpoint button.
input.stripe_instructions_7: In the Endpoint URL field, add your website's URL in this format: %s
input.stripe_instructions_8: In the Events to send field, select the checkout.session.completed and click the Add endpoint button.
input.stripe_instructions_9: Copy the Signing secret key and paste it here accordingly.
input.offline_payment_is_enabled: Enable cash on hand / card terminal payments

business.subheader: These details will be used when generating invoices for the customer and for you.

input.hours_help: Write in your business hours. Ex: 10:00 AM - 10:00 PM, 24/7...
input.is_enabled_help: The main switch that makes the store keep working.
input.is_se_visible_help: If disabled, the store will not be indexed by search engines, such as Google or Bing.
input.is_removed_branding_help: If enabled, the store won't show the branding of our website.

api_documentation.title: API Documentation
api_documentation.subheader: This is the documentation for the available API endpoints, which are built around the REST architecture. All the API endpoints will return a JSON response with the standard HTTP response codes and need a Bearer Authentication via an API Key.

authentication.subheader: All the API endpoints require an API key sent by the Bearer Authentication method.

user.subheader: This API endpoint is responsible for retrieving all the related user data.

get.subheader: This endpoint is made to retrieve the details of your own account.

error_message.short_password: Your password is too short, you must have at least 6 characters!
error_message.passwords_not_matching: Your entered passwords do not match!

main.name: Name
main.type_help: Admin users will have the same privileges as you, be careful!

admin_store_delete_modal.subheader: By deleting the store, everything that is associated with the store will be deleted. This action cannot be undone.

main.helper: Make sure that your domain or subdomain has an A record pointing to 167.71.35.170 or CNAME record pointing to %s.
main.host_help: Only subdomain.domain.com and domain.com formats are allowed (subdomains or root domains).
main.custom_index_url_help: Redirect to a specific url when visitors land on the index of the domain. Only works if the domain doesn't have a main store associated to it.

admin_domain_delete_modal.subheader: By deleting the domain, everything that is associated with the domain will be deleted, including all the associated stores. This action cannot be undone.

admin_domain_create.title: Add additional global domain
admin_domain_create.subheader: Make sure to properly read the Documentation on how to setup Custom Domains.

admin_settings.title: Website Settings
admin_settings.documentation: Read the Documentation to get more details on certain available configurations.

main.title: Website title
main.default_language_help: To add more languages, please consult the documentation.
main.logo_help: jpg, jpeg, png and svg accepted. Recommended size: Max height of 40px and transparent.
main.favicon_help: jpg, jpeg, png and ico accepted.
main.email_confirmation_help: Send out email confirmation when a user registers or changes his email address.
main.register_is_enabled_help: Allow people to register on your platform or completely disable the register page.
main.default_timezone_help: The default timezone for users when they are registering (they can change it later on).
main.index_url_help: Set the full custom index url ( ex: https://google.com/ ) if you want to completely disable the default landing page of the product. Helpful when you want to have your own landing page. Leave empty to disable.
main.terms_and_conditions_url_help: Link to the terms and conditions of the website. Can be a link created with the Pages creator from the sidebar.
main.privacy_policy_url_help: Link to the privacy policy of the website. Can be a link created with the Pages creator from the sidebar.

payment.is_enabled_help: Disabling the payment system will remove all the options for the users to upgrade their accounts or see any payment related information.
payment.brand_name_help: The brand name will be used for displaying the brand when users purchase via payment gates. (ex: paypal)
payment.currency_help: Currency Code for the payments (ex: USD).
payment.codes_is_enabled_help: Enabling the discount codes system will enable users to add a discount code created from the admin panel, before they checkout.
payment.taxes_and_billing_is_enabled_help: Enabling this feature will require users to fill in their Billing info before checking out and you will also be able to create taxes for each created plan.
payment.offline_payment_instructions_help: Payment instructions for the user to see, before submitting the payment.

business.subheader: These details will be used when generating invoices for the user.
business.invoice_is_enabled_help: This option will determine if users will be able to see invoices for their payments or not.
business.invoice_nr_prefix_help: Your Nr Prefix for all the invoices generated on the system. Ex: INV-
business.name: Name

stores.domains_is_enabled_help: Enabling this will give your users the ability to add and use custom domains.
stores.additional_domains_is_enabled: Enable the Additional Custom Domains system
stores.additional_domains_is_enabled_help: Enabling this will give you the ability to add global domains via the admin panel that your users can use as additional domains.
stores.main_domain_is_enabled: Enable the usage of the main domain
stores.main_domain_is_enabled_help: Enabling this will give your users the ability to use the main domain to short urls and create biolink pages. This function will only work if the Custom Domains system is enabled and there is at least one global custom domain available. Even if this option is disabled, admins will still be allowed to use the main domain.
stores.email_reports_is_enabled_help: Enabling the email reports will give your users the ability to get email reports of their stores analytics. Make sure to have a proper email sending configuration via the SMTP tab.

captcha.login_is_enabled: Enable captcha on the login page
captcha.register_is_enabled: Enable captcha on the register page
captcha.lost_password_is_enabled: Enable captcha on the lost password page
captcha.resend_activation_is_enabled: Enable captcha on the resend activation page

ads.ads_help: These fields accept text, html or javascript.

socials.socials_help: Social links to be displayed in the footer of the website. Enter only the id / name of the page

smtp.host_help: If there are no values entered in this field then the system will try to use the default mail function.
smtp.from_help: The email that the users get the email from / the 'reply-to' email.
smtp.from_name_help: The name associated with the email below.

custom.head_js_help: Add your own tracking js code ( ex: Google Analytics ).
custom.head_css_help: Add custom CSS in case you want to overwrite certain styles of the website.

email_notifications.emails_help: Emails that will receive a notification when one of the actions from below are performed. Add valid email addresses separated by a comma.
email_notifications.new_user_help: Receive an email when a new users registers to the website.
email_notifications.new_payment_help: Receive an email when a new payment is successfully processed.

cron.url_help: This cron job url contains your key of access also. Only calls with this exact url will work.

license.license_help: The license you got from purchasing the product.
license.new_license_help: Leave empty if you don't want to change it. Useful when changing your license or upgrading to a new one (ex: from Regular License to Extended )

button.test_email_help: It will send an email to the value from the From field that you set above. Make sure to first save the settings!

success_message.email: The test email has been sent successfully!

admin_statistics.title: Website Statistics
admin_statistics.subheader: See how your website evolves throughout time.

payments.subheader: This website has generated %s %s revenue on %s sales.
payments.no_payments: There are no recorded payments for this date range.

email_reports.subheader: How many email reports are sent out per day.

admin_api_documentation.title: Admin API Documentation
admin_api_documentation.subheader: This is the documentation for the available API endpoints, only for the admins, which are built around the REST architecture. All the API endpoints will return a JSON response with the standard HTTP response codes and need a Bearer Authentication via an API Key.

authentication.subheader: All the API endpoints require an API key sent by the Bearer Authentication method.

update.plan_id: free, trial or an integer plan_id
update.plan_expiration_date: Y-m-d H:i:s format in UTC timezone

one_time_login_code.header: Generate a one time login code

notfound.title: Not found
notfound.subheader: The page youre looking for was not found.

email_reports.title: Summary analytics for %s between %s and %s
email_reports.p1: Here is a short analytics overview of what happened on the %s store.
email_reports.notice: You are getting these emails because you have enabled email reports in your %sStore settings%s page.
